casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

April, 1998

(April 29, 1998) Joseph N. Gorea, Jr., Appellant, v Nancy Glover, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Evan M. Glover, Deceased, et al., Respondents. (Appeal No. 1.) [671 NYS2d 377]

—Appeal unanimously dismissed without costs (see, Hughes v Nussbaumer, Clarke & Velzy, 140 AD2d 988; see also, Chase Manhattan Bank v Roberts & Roberts, 63 AD2d 566, 567; CPLR *8875501 [a] [1]). (Appeal from Order of Supreme Court, Ontario County, Henry, Jr., J. — Summary Judgment.) Present — Den-man, P. J., Lawton, Boehm and Fallon, JJ.
